Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western (OH). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western (O'Hare Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
